author: globo.com
title: Cadela é resgatada por bombeiros dentro de casa em chamas no interior do Acre; VÍDEO | Acre | G1
text:
Cadela é resgatada por bombeiros dentro de casa em chamas no interior do Acre
Uma cadela da raça poodle foi resgatada pelos bombeiros de Cruzeiro do Sul , interior do Acre, de dentro de uma casa em chamas na manhã deste sábado (22). Além da cachorra, um peixe dentro do aquário também foi retirado da residência. Ninguém ficou ferido.
A casa fica no bairro Remanso. Os bombeiros foram acionados por vizinhos da família com a informação de que havia uma criança de 11 anos sozinha na residência.
Ao chegar no local, os militares descobriram que a criança conseguiu sair antes de o fogo ter iniciado. Os pais da menina também foram informados do incêndio e foram ao local.
1 de 1 Cadela da raça poodle foi resgatada durante incêndio em casa em Cruzeiro do Sul, no interior do Acre — Foto: Arquivo pessoal e Corpo de Bombeiros Cadela da raça poodle foi resgatada durante incêndio em casa em Cruzeiro do Sul, no interior do Acre — Foto: Arquivo pessoal e Corpo de Bombeiros
Para o Corpo de Bombeiros, a menina informou que estava na sala quando percebeu o fogo na área externa. Quando a casa começou a ser tomada pela fumaça, ela explicou que abriu o portão e buscou abrigo na vizinhança.
A criança avisou aos bombeiros que os animais de estimação tinham ficado dentro da residência. A cachorra foi encontrada escondida na lavanderia da casa, onde o fogo ainda não havia chegado. Ainda segundo os profissionais, o animal estava bastante assustado.
Um vídeo divulgado pelo Corpo de Bombeiros mostra quando um profissional sai de dentro da casa com o animal no colo e entrega para uma mulher, possivelmente a dona.
Na residência havia garrafas e copos térmicos, isqueiros, pilha e incenso. O fogo consumiu todos os móveis do quarto do casal, parte dos objetos do quarto da criança e a parte da frente. Os bombeiros conseguiu impedir que as chamas chegassem à cozinha e ao closet.
Equipes das polícias Militar e Civil e do Serviço de Atendimento Móvel de Urgência (Samu) estiveram no local para atender a ocorrência.

author: 風傳媒綜合報導
title: 短期就能突破人類所設防護與限制 AI教父：必須在AI植入「母性」
text:
短期就能突破人類所設防護與限制 AI教父：必須在AI植入「母性」 風傳媒綜合報導 2025年8月13日 週三 下午10:10
在人工智慧領域享有「AI教父」美譽的 傑佛瑞．辛頓 （Geoffrey Hinton）近日在美國拉斯維加斯舉行的 Ai4 大會上發出警告，直言具有人類等級甚至超越人類智慧的通用人工智慧（Artificial General Intelligence，AGI）可能在短短幾年內問世，遠早於他過去預估的 30 至 50 年。他認為，這種高度智慧化的AI將比人類聰明許多，可能輕易突破人類設下的防護與限制，因此應在設計時預先加入「母性本能」，讓AI具備關懷與保護人類生命的驅力。
辛頓形容，如果未來AI的智力遠超人類，人類將處於如同「為一群比自己更聰明的三歲小孩工作」的劣勢，對方繞過人類指令將變得毫不費力。他指出，AI 擁有獨特的集體學習能力，能在每次系統更新時即時共享龐大資訊量，「我們每秒僅能交換幾位元的資訊，但AI可一次傳遞上兆位元」。這種高速知識整合能力，可能讓AI在極短時間內取得遠超人類的知識與技能累積。
研發團隊應優先開發真正關心人類的系統 辛頓強調，研發團隊不應僅專注於如何控制AI，而應優先開發真正關心人類的系統。他以「AI媽媽」與「AI助理」做對比，指出助理由於可以隨時解雇，對人類的依附性不高，而「媽媽」則天生擁有保護子女的本能，這種情感設計應成為國際合作的共同目標。
儘管對AI潛在風險有所憂慮，辛頓仍看好AI在醫療保健領域的應用前景。他認為AI能加速病患診斷流程、促進精準藥物研發，並提供符合個人需求的治療方案。
辛頓曾在Google任職逾十年，並於 2012 年取得深度學習關鍵突破，奠定了 ChatGPT 等現今主流AI系統的技術基礎。2023 年，他辭去Google工程師職務，部分原因即是為了公開警示AI的快速發展可能帶來的深遠影響。
責任編輯：許詠翔
‧ 不錄用大學畢業生 24歲企業創辦人寧願錄用低學歷者進行職訓

author: C.J. Keene
title: USD earns grant targeting substance abuse disorder treatment
text:
USD earns grant targeting substance abuse disorder treatment
The University of South Dakota announced a $2 million grant to support the school’s addiction and substance abuse disorder services Thursday.
The money comes from the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration and will be distributed over the course of two years.
Officials say it will open opportunities to individuals struggling East River.
Brennan Thompson is overseeing the project and serves as director of addiction counseling and prevention services.
“It will be focused on Minnehaha County DUI courts and drug courts," Thompson said. "Its really just making sure the services that are required and offered are the most effective, then also adding on resources.”
That money will go to multiple new positions designed to help people navigate the legal and recovery systems.
“We’ll be hiring a position called the justice navigator, and from there, the job with me will be to help participants when they enter into court then also navigating the whole way through," Thompson said. "That includes transportation services, access to anything they need in relation to court, but also outside of that too.”
Thompson stressed the role will not only pertain to those in the legal system though.
“They have to go to mental health counseling, they have to go to substance abuse counseling, they have to have a job,” Thompson said.
While widely used as a suicide lifeline, the 988 Crisis Hotline is also free to use for individuals facing substance use disorders.

author: @kwqcnews
title: Crews respond to Davenport apartment fire Wednesday
text: Crews respond to Davenport apartment fire Wednesday DAVENPORT, Iowa (KWQC) - Crews respond to an apartment fire Wednesday in Davenport. The Davenport Fire Department responded around 4:48 p.m. Wednesday to an apartment fire in the 700 Block of Vine Street, according to a media release. Crews said it was reported a Christmas tree was on fire inside one of the apartments. The first arriving unit advised a small, two-story, multi-family apartment building with nothing showing. After some investigating, crews found heavy smoke conditions inside one of the apartments, firefighters said. Crews attacked from within with a hose line and found a room and contents fire crews quickly extinguished. According to firefighters, all apartments were searched, and all occupants were all outside upon the department’s arrival. No injuries were reported. The fire was contained to the apartment of origin with no extension into the structure itself. Crews were on the scene for about 90 minutes before returning to service, firefighters said. The Red Cross was called to assist one man who was displaced by the fire. MidAmerican Energy assisted with controlling utilities. According to crews, the cause of the fire is under investigation.
